Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/24th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/24th due to street blockage near California/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/24th due to street blockage near California/24th.

Northbound buses will operate via California, 24th Blvd., Cermak and California, over normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via California, Cermak, 24th Blvd. and California over normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, 75th and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop Elevated Service Delayed at Quincy
ShortDescription: Green, Orange, Brown and Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to sick customer near at Quincy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to sick customer near at Quincy.
As a result of the delayed train, All elevated Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (Loop-bound trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
